prompt_base: raw photo, close up portrait of a young woman, piercing cold blue eyes, (short straight hair:1.1), natural skin texture, masterpiece
feature_prompt: highly detailed skin pores, source palette preservation, identical color matching, subtle freckles, (matching denim fabric texture:1.2), film grain
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, plastic, doll, mannequin, cgi, 3d render, exaggerated eyes, makeup, airbrushed, low quality, (long hair:1.2)
